text: Would it be possible to exdend the system templates to <http://schema.org|schema.org> relevant types? Like "create an Q/A page" or "create an FAQ" page? Ideally those pages would give the editor the opportunity to fill out the necessary <http://schemo.org|schemo.org> meta data on a page level without the need to copy and paste the markup?

That will be good :)
For the moment, you can create module to add this schema with json-ld or microdata :)

yes, that is what i am doing now. But i figured that, given that google and others behind schema might be expanding the markup in the future, it would be good to have this in place without a workaround :slightly_smiling_face:
You totally right. Add json-ld markup creation directly on HubSpot Setting will be awesome
